1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import time
4 import rospy
5 import rospkg
6 import IPython
7 import argparse
8 import openravepy as orpy
9 import dynamic_reconfigure.server
10 from octomap_server.cfg import OctomapServerConfig
11 from visualization_msgs.msg import MarkerArray
12 
13 def parse_args():
14  format_class = argparse.RawDescriptionHelpFormatter
15  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(formatter_class=format_class,
16  description='Simulation of a complete inspection task')
17  # Inspection parameters
18  parser.add_argument('--file-name', metavar='', type=str,
19  default='octomap',
20  help='File name for the generated octomap. Default=%(default)s')
21  parser.add_argument('--topic', metavar='', type=str,
22  default='/camera/depth/points',
23  help='Point cloud topic name. Default=%(default)s')
24  parser.add_argument('--frame', metavar='', type=str,
25  default='map',
26  help='The W.R.T. frame. Default=%(default)s')
27  parser.add_argument('--range', metavar='', type=float, default=2.0,
28  help='Max range of the input point cloud (m). Default=%(default).2f')
29  parser.add_argument('--resolution', metavar='', type=float, default=0.005,
30  help='Leaf cube size (mm) of the octomap. Default=%(default).2f')
31  parser.add_argument('--timeout', metavar='', type=float, default=10,
32  help='Timeout (s) for the octomap creation. Default=%(default).2f')
33  args = parser.parse_args(rospy.myargv()[1:])
34  return args
35 
36 class OctomapCreation(object):
37  def __init__(self, args):
38  # Initialize values
39  self.busy = False
40  self.topic_name = args.topic
41  rospack = rospkg.RosPack()
42  path = rospack.get_path('or_octomap_plugin') + '/tests/'
43  self.file_name = path+args.file_name
44  self.octomap_resolution = str(args.resolution)
45  self.octomap_range = args.range
46  self.octomap_frame = args.frame
47  self.timeout = args.timeout
48  self.pause = False
49  # self.env_name = '' # TODO:
50  # self.robot_name = '' # TODO:
51  # self.obstacle_name = '' # TODO:
52  self.durations = []
53  # Initialize OpenRAVE environment
54  self.env = orpy.Environment()
55  self.env.SetViewer('qtcoin')
56  orpy.RaveSetDebugLevel(orpy.DebugLevel.Error)
57  # self.env.Load(self.env_name)
58  # Initialize ROS subscribers and publisher
59  self.sub_octomap = rospy.Subscriber('/occupied_cells_vis_array',
60  MarkerArray,
61  callback=self.process_octomap,
62  queue_size=1)
63  # Initialize octomap plugin
64  orpy.RaveLoadPlugin("or_octomap") # Load octomap plugin
65  self.sensor_server = orpy.RaveCreateSensorSystem(self.env, "or_octomap")
66  self.sensor_server.SendCommand("Enable") # Enable octomap thread
67  self.sensor_server.SendCommand("ResetTopic " +
68  self.topic_name) # Reset the registered pcl topic
69  self.sensor_server.SendCommand("ResetResolution " +
70  self.octomap_resolution) # Reset the octomap resolution
71  self.sensor_server.SendCommand("ResetFrameID " +
72  self.octomap_frame) # Reset the octomap frame
73 
74  # Initialize dynamic reconfigure server
75  self.server_d = dynamic_reconfigure.server.Server(OctomapServerConfig, self.cb_reconfig_server, '')
76 
77  # Reset octomap server parameters
78  self.sensor_server.SendCommand('TogglePause')
79  rospy.sleep(0.1)
80  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/sensor_model_max_range', self.octomap_range)
81  self.sensor_server.SendCommand('Reset')
82  self.time_start = time.time()
83 
84  def cb_reconfig_server(self, config, level):
85  """
86  Dynamic reconfigure callback.
87  """
88  if not self.pause:
89  self.sensor_server.SendCommand('TogglePause')
90  self.pause = not self.pause
91  # rospy.sleep(0.1)
92  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/max_depth', config['max_depth'])
93  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/pointcloud_min_z', config['pointcloud_min_z'])
94  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/pointcloud_max_z', config['pointcloud_max_z'])
95  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/occupancy_min_z', config['occupancy_min_z'])
96  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/occupancy_max_z', config['occupancy_max_z'])
97  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/filter_speckles', config['filter_speckles'])
98  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/filter_ground', config['filter_ground'])
99  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/compress_map', config['compress_map'])
100  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/incremental_2D_projection', config['incremental_2D_projection'])
101  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/ground_filter_distance', config['ground_filter_distance'])
102  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/ground_filter_angle', config['ground_filter_angle'])
103  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/ground_filter_plane_distance', config['ground_filter_plane_distance'])
104  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/sensor_model_max_range', config['sensor_model_max_range'])
105  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/sensor_model_min', config['sensor_model_min'])
106  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/sensor_model_max', config['sensor_model_max'])
107  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/sensor_model_hit', config['sensor_model_hit'])
108  rospy.set_param('or_octomap/sensor_model_miss', config['sensor_model_miss'])
109  if self.pause:
110  self.sensor_server.SendCommand('TogglePause')
111  self.pause = not self.pause
112  return config
113 
114  def process_octomap(self, msg):
115  """
116  Processing octomap message.
117  """
118  assert(type(msg)==MarkerArray)
119  if self.busy:
120  rospy.loginfo('Processing previous data.')
121  return
122  for marker in msg.markers:
123  if len(marker.points) > 0:
124  self.busy = True
125  break
126 
127  def execute(self):
128  """
129  Save and load octomap into OpenRAVE
130  """
131  rate = rospy.Rate(100)
132  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
133  clock=time.time()-self.time_start
134  if clock > self.timeout:
135  rospy.logwarn('Timeout.')
136  rospy.signal_shutdown('Timeout shutdown')
137  if self.busy:
138  self.durations += [time.time()-self.time_start]
139  self.sensor_server.SendCommand('TogglePause')
140  self.pause = not self.pause
141  time.sleep(0.5)
142  # self.sensor_server.SendCommand("Mask " + self.robot_name)
143  # self.sensor_server.SendCommand("Mask " + self.obstacle_name)
144  self.sensor_server.SendCommand("Save " + self.file_name)
145  self.env.Load(self.file_name + '.wrl')
146  self.busy=False
147  rospy.loginfo('Octomap created.')
148  # rospy.signal_shutdown('Terminal shutdown')
149  self.sensor_server.SendCommand('TogglePause')
150  self.pause = not self.pause
151  break
152  rate.sleep()
153 
154 if __name__ == "__main__":
155 
156  node_args = parse_args()
157  rospy.init_node('octomap_creation', log_level=rospy.DEBUG)
158  octomap_creation = OctomapCreation(node_args)
159  octomap_creation.execute()
160 
161  IPython.embed()
162  exit()
